title: Four PSU banks pay Rs 6,481 cr dividend to Govt
description: Four public sector banks, Canara Bank, Indian Bank, Bank of India, and EXIM Bank, present dividend cheques totaling Rs 6,481 crore to Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman for the financial year 2023-24.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
